ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, Of course.You can receive a very comprehensive training, from making presentations to pronunciation.It is the best english class I have ever taken.
Yes. I would definitely recommend it to other international students like me because we can learn a lot about how to communicate in academia.

- I recommend this class especially to those who want to know why you do not communicate well in English even though you have acquired strong vocabulary ability.- It was hard for me not to be shy to have opportunities to speak in the class. But the lecturer helped well in this respect by distributing the speaking turns to everyone.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: To help me systematically find my weakness in learning English, and give pressure to keep study.
It helps me to communicate more effectively with my adviser and fellow students.
You can improve the skill that you need in your academic life such as presentation and debate skill in this course.
